Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: It’s your only choice when visiting the Van Gogh Museum, as you can’t leave and come back with a timed-ticket, so luckily the food is great. The relaxing atmosphere is a welcome reprieve from the madness of the very popular museum. The food …

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: Nice place to take a health and flavour food. You can see the museum plain gardens when you eat. The staff is very kindly.

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: This is a wonderful restaurant, a true treat in the museum! They have a wide selection of all kinds of dishes and the seating area is beautiful.

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: Great atmosphere, delicious fruit juices but very expensive.. It is inside the van gogh museum, first floor. You pay only by card

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: After seeing the museum my friend and I stopped in for coffee while we waited for our friends. The head chef came out and chatted with us for a while and gave us some complimentary snacks. Great experience.

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: Saw a rat this morning and told the staff. We took a picture but it wasn't very clear as the rat was hiding. The staff even said post it in fb. When we finish walking inside the museum the restaurant is full of people eating there.

Name: Le Tambourin

Name: Le Tambourin

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: BEWARE!! Check your items or receipt before paying!! Cashier charges the wrong amount but we only managed to get a portion of our money back as they made a mistake again on our refund. They took our receipt and they refused to give it to us. The manager here is a joke.

Name: Le Tambourin
Review Text: Visit the Van Gogh museum but don't bother with the restaurant. Small portions of bland food outrageously overpriced.
